pullrequest.title: double fork to prevent orphaned processes

content.html:
This is headed in the right direction. I think that we also need a SIGINT handler installed that will kill() the children. Something like:

    kill(pid1, SIGINT);
    kill(pid2, SIGINT);
    <wait for a bounded amount of time for them to die; if any are still alive, give them a kill(pid{1|2}, SIGKILL)>
